snippet.title: In the Black Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Crowdfunded on Kickstarter under the working title "Starfighter Inc."

In The Black is a hardcore space combat simulator featuring intense multiplayer team-based battles, rich single-player content, and extensive ship customization options. In development for PC by Impeller Studios with a team led by Jack Mamais and David Wessman, the designers of the X-Wing series, Mechwarrior II:  Mercenaries, Blood Wake, Far Cry, Saints Row, Crysis and more. The game has already been awarded the Atomic Rockets Seal of Approval in recognition of its respect for scientific realism.

Early Access is imminent! Please wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/380110/In_The_Black/

Sign-up for our email list: http://bit.ly/ImpellerEmail

Subscribe / like these links so you get the latest announcements:
 - Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/impellerstudios
 - YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/ImpellerStudios
 - Twitter: https://twitter.com/ImpellerStudios/ & https://twitter.com/InTheBlackGame
 - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/impellerstudios/

Join our growing community of steely-eyed missile men and women on Discord https://discord.gg/h4MeAzQUNy
